name: Big Bad Wolf
overview: Don't let the wolf gobble you up. NOT for kids only. This game by Bruce Robinson has you in the storybook world preparing for the imminent arrival of that nasty wolf and preparing to take him on as he tries to breach the house. Originally published by Bruce's Victory Software. The game was later licensed for distribution by Commodore itself. Also listed as being published later by the UK's Rabbit Software, although it's not known if that release was authorized; Mogul Communications were the usual UK licensee.
